title: Takiwaza
author: Takiwaza
content: Hello Everyone , having a Great Day?I have something to share with all of you Guys.................. Will have a New Event that you should try it for yourself    Here is the link that you can read and see  https://k8.io/promotions/Daily-Deposit-BonusDaily 100% Deposit BonusContent：Get 100% Bonus on your first deposit on the day!How to join：100% bonus up to $3,000 is applicable to the first deposit of the day;Please contact our live support to receive the bonus and complete 15x wagering of your deposit plus bonus before withdrawing your winnings.VIP Level                        Bonus Amount              Daily Bonus Limit   Wager RequirementIron - Silver                             100%                         $300                      x15Gold - Platinum 4                     100%                           $1,000                   x15Platinum 5 - Diamond                 100%                           $3,000                 x15Terms and Conditions:The promotion is according to UTC+0 time zone. Only one offer can be claimed per deposit, and it cannot be in conflict with other deposit bonus promotions;Please note that the wager requirements for this promotion only counts towards slot machine games, other games will not be counted;Email, phone number and KYC level 2 verification must be completed before this bonus can be claimed;Each account (including but not limited to IP address, device information, and wallet address) is only eligible for this bonus once. Duplicate applications will not be accepted;To avoid any discrepancies in interpretation, K8 reserves the right to make the final interpretation of this promotion.
